subject: Good interview of Frank Sumption
author: Misty
full_text:
I caught the show with a few others last night. Great interview and its 
always nice to hear Frank S speak about his own story rather than have 
others make it up as they go. 

You ALL did great!

For those who missed it you can find the show link on Chris' page and 
download it for the replay.

http://www.blogtalkradio.com/HauntedTimesMagazine/


Misty
